summary: Apex Predator of Logistics Efficiency. Architect of high-volume fuel dispatch systems. Master of scheduling, inventory reconciliation, and conflict resolution. Proven ability to cut manual admin by 40% through automation. Expert in fuel logistics, driver coordination, and freight invoicing.

bullets: Architected automation tools that cut dispatch admin by 40%
Deployed secure JWT/Okta API authentication for driver data
Built Apache Genie CLI for rapid server provisioning
Diagnosed and restored critical systems to guarantee uptime
Executed high-volume last-mile fuel deliveries with 4.9+ rating
Optimized routes, slashing fuel consumption and delivery time
Resolved on-road issues in real time, maintaining customer trust
Designed custom scheduling system that cut driver downtime by 30%
Managed fleet of 20+ drivers, ensuring 99% on-time fuel deliveries
Maintained DOT compliance and audit-ready logs
Automated load tracking and invoicing, boosting efficiency by 25%
Integrated new TMS and CRM, modernizing account management
Coordinated shipments between dispatch and client teams
Ensured timely delivery and resolved delivery conflicts

education: Associate of Science in Computer Science (In Progress), Modesto Junior College
Culinary Arts Program, Placer County Adult Education
